Description_lang: Instructs your pet to protect a friendly target from critical strikes, making attacks against that target unable to be critical strikes$?a137016[][, but $s2% of all damage taken by that target is also taken by the pet]. Lasts $d.$?a137016[While Roar of Sacrifice is active, your Spotting Eagle cannot apply Spotter's Mark.][]
AuraDescription_lang: Immune to critical strikes$?aa137016[][, but damage transferred to the Hunter's pet].
